definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
Delaware River, between Pennsylvania and Delaware state, USA

sentences.english: The voyage lasted 46 minutes, from its departure in Philadephia to its landing across the Delaware River.
sentences.chinese: 從費城出發抵達特拉華河對面的旅程持續了46分鐘。

sentences.english: The states bordering on the Delaware River have entered into a compact for the sharing of its water.
sentences.chinese: 特拉華河鄰近的各州締結了共同用水的協定。

sentences.english: At 10, his family moved to the state of Delaware, northeast of Washington DC.
sentences.chinese: 歲時，全家遷至華盛頓特區東北部的特拉華州。

sentences.english: Delaware, the Diamond or First State, achieved statehood.
sentences.chinese: 別稱“鑽石州”或“第一州”的美國特拉華建州。

sentences.english: People wondered why Revere was on the Delaware quarter.
sentences.chinese: 人們想知道爲什麼裏維爾在特拉華州的四分之一。

sentences.english: The ball was set rolling in the 1960s by Dr Heck, of the University of Delaware.
sentences.chinese: 這一做法源自於特拉華大學的海克博士。

sentences.english: Please always use this form for incorporation in Deleware.
sentences.chinese: 涉及在特拉華州成立的公司，請遵照以上格式填寫。

sentences.english: Delaware required an oath affirming belief in the Trinity.
sentences.chinese: 特拉華州則要求發誓相信三位一體的宗教信仰原則。

sentences.english: At last he crossed the Delaware River.
sentences.chinese: 最後他渡過了特拉華河。

sentences.english: The family moved to the state of Delaware when Biden was 10.
sentences.chinese: 拜登10歲那年，全家遷到特拉華州。

sentences.english: They filed joint federal and Delaware income tax returns. Dr.
sentences.chinese: 他們一同上報了聯邦稅收和特拉華州收入稅額。

sentences.english: The Delawares never trust to broken branches, unless it is in friendly times.
sentences.chinese: 特拉華人就決不相信折斷的樹枝，除非是在和平時期。
